phrases: Water.
Earth.
Fire.
Air.
Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
I cannot believe I lost him.
You did everything you could...
Zuko cannot have gotten far.
We will find him.
Aang's going to be fine.
Okay.
It is all right.
You stay here, Momo, in case Aang comes back.
Yip!
Yip!
Hello?
I am sorry to disturb you,...
Go... away.
You are still here?
Yes!
I need...
Perhaps that thing will help you?
Chase it!
Finally!
Come back!
Hello, Aang.
Roku!
Shelter!
Roku, the Water Tribe is under attack.
I need to find the Ocean and Moon spirits!
The Ocean and the Moon are ancient spirits.
They crossed over from the Spirit World to the Mortal World very near the beginning.
There is only one spirit I know of who is old enough to remember.
Who?
The spirit's name is Koh.
But he is very dangerous.
They call him... the Face Stealer.
When you speak with him you must be very careful to show no emotion at all...
I finally have you.
But I cannot get you home because of this blizzard.
There is always something.
Not that you would understand.
You are like my sister.
Everything always... came easy to her.
She is a firebending prodigy... and everyone adores her.
My father says she was born lucky.
He says I was lucky to be born.
I do not need luck though, I do not want it.
I have always had to struggle and fight and that is made me strong.
It is made me who I am.
I do not need to remind you we have a time limit.
If we do not defeat the Water Tribe before the full moon rises they will be undefeatable.
I assure you I have everything under control.
I intend to remove the moon as a factor.
Remove the moon!?
How?
Admiral Choi!
Prepare to meet your fate!
As I was saying... years ago I stumbled upon a great and powerful secret...
What?
I was a young Lieutenant serving under General Shu in the Earth Kingdom...
I discovered a hidden library, underground in fact.
I tore through scroll after scroll.
One of them contained a detailed illustration and the words moon and ocean.
I knew then that these spirits could be found... and killed.
And that it was my destiny to do so.
Zhao, the Spirits are not to be trifled with!
Yes, yes, I know you fear the Spirits, Iroh.
I have heard rumors about your journey into the Spirit World.
But the Ocean and Moon gave up their immortality to become a part of our world...
Oh!
Whew!
You are just a curly tailed blue nose.
Show no fear.
Show no emotion at all.
Hello?
I am looking for a spirit named Koh.
Thank you.
My old friend, the Avatar.
It is been a long time.
You know me?
How could I forget you!
One of your previous incarnations tried to slay me!
It was eight or nine hundred years ago.
I did not know that.
Why did he... or I... try to kill you?
Oh... it was something about stealing the face of someone you loved...
Of course, that is all behind us.
Why should I hold a grudge against you for something in a past life?
After all, you are a different person now.
You have come to me... with a new face.
Guess we will be here awhile.
Do not worry!
Prince Zuko cannot be getting too far in this weather.
I am not worried they will get away in the blizzard.
I am worried that they will not.
They are not going to die in this blizzard.
If we know anything it is that Zuko never gives up.
They will survive... and we will find them!
It is been a long time since I have added a child's face to my collection.
So... how may I help you?
I need to find the Moon and the Ocean.
Their spirit names are Tui and La.
Push... and Pull... and that has been the nature of their relationship for all time.
Please, help me find them.
An entire culture could be destroyed if I do not get their help.
Oh, you think you need their help?
Actually, it is quite the other way around.
Someone is going to kill them!
What do you mean?
How can I find them and protect them?
You have already met them, actually.
Tui and La, your Moon and Ocean,...
They balance each other... push and pull... life and death...
The koi fish!
I must be going now.
We will meet again.
The spirits are in trouble.
I need to get back to the physical world.
A friend is here to guide you back.
Hei-Bai!
We will be following this map to a very special location.
And when we get there... we are going fishing.
This is where I came in.
But how do I get back?
Good riddance.
Momo!
Momo?
Oh no!
Where is my body?
Look!
That is got to be Aang!
Yip!
Yip!
Good to be back.
That will not be enough to escape.
Appa!
Here for a rematch?
Trust me, Zuko, it is not going to be much of a match.
Hey!
This is some quality rope!
We need to get to the oasis!
The spirits are in trouble!
Wait, we cannot just leave him here.
Sure we can.
Let us go.
No, if we leave him, he will die.
Yeh, this makes a lot of sense.
Let us bring the guy who is constantly trying to kill us!
Are you okay?
I feel faint.
I feel it too.
The Moon Spirit is in trouble.
I owe the Moon Spirit my life.
What do you mean?
When I was born I was very sick and very weak.
Most babies cry when they are born...
Our healers did everything they could.
They told my mother and father I was going to die.
My father pleaded with the spirits to save me...
My dark hair turned white, I opened my eyes and began to cry...
That is why my mother named me Yue, for the moon.
I am... a legend now!
The Fire Nation will for generations tell stories about...
They will call me Zhao the Conqueror!
Zhao the Moon Slayer!
Zhao The Invincible!
Huh!
Get it off!
Get if off!
Do not bother!
Zhao!
Do not!
It is my destiny... to destroy the Moon... and the Water Tribe.
Destroying the moon will not hurt just the Water Tribe.
It will hurt everyone... including you.
Without the moon, everything would fall out of balance.
You have no idea what kind of chaos that would unleash on the world.
He is right, Zhao!
General Iroh, why am I not surprised to discover your treachery?
I am no traitor, Zhao, the Fire Nation needs the moon too.
We all depend on the balance.
Whatever you do to that spirit I will unleash on you ten-fold!
Let it go, now!
There is no hope now.
It is over.
No, it is not over.
You are alive?
You tried to have me killed!
Yes, I did.
You are the Blue Spirit... and enemy of the Fire Nation!
You freed the Avatar!
I had no choice!
You should have chosen to accept your failure... your disgrace!
Then, at least you could have lived!
It is too late.
It is dead.
You have been touched by the Moon Spirit.
Some of its life is in you!
Yes, you are right.
It gave me life.
Maybe I can give it back.
No!
You do not have to do that!
It is my duty, Sokka.
I will not let you!
Your father told me to protect you!
I have to do this.
No!
She is gone.
She is gone.
Goodbye, Sokka.
I will always be with you.
It cannot be!
Take my hand!
I have decided to go to the South Pole.
Some other benders and healers want to join me.
It is time we helped rebuild our sister tribe.
What about Aang?
He still needs to learn waterbending.
Well, then he better get used to calling you Master Katara.
The Spirits gave me a vision when Yue was born.
I saw... a beautiful, brave young woman... become the Moon Spirit.
I knew this day would come.
You must be proud.
So proud.
And sad.
I am surprised, Prince Zuko,...
I am tired.
Then you should rest.
A man needs his rest.
You too, Momo.
Come here.
Iroh is a traitor and your brother Zuko is a failure.
I have a task for you.
